00064 /* Header file guard bands */
00065 #ifndef ICCCONFIG_h
00066 #define ICCCONFIG_h
00067 
00068 //Define the following to use namespace
00069 //#define USESAMPLEICCNAMESPACE
00070 
00071 #ifdef USESAMPLEICCNAMESPACE
00072 namespace sampleICC {
00073 #endif
00074 
00075 //PC, visual C++
00076 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && !defined(__MWERKS__) && defined(_M_IX86)
00077 
00078   //Define how 64 bit integers are represented
00079   #define ICCUINT64 unsigned __int64
00080   #define ICCINT64 __int64
00081   #define ICUINT64TYPE unsigned __int64
00082   #define ICINT64TYPE __int64
00083 
00084   #define ICCUINT32 unsigned long
00085   #define ICCINT32  long
00086   #define ICUINT32TYPE unsigned long
00087   #define ICINT32TYPE  long
00088 
00089   #define USE_WINDOWS_MB_SUPPORT
00090   #define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN    // Exclude rarely-used stuff from Windows headers
00091   //#include <windows.h> //For Multibyte Translation Support
00092 
00093   #define ICC_BYTE_ORDER_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00094 
00095   #if defined(ICCPROFLIBDLL_EXPORTS)
00096     #define ICCPROFLIB_API _declspec(dllexport)
00097     #define ICCPROFLIB_EXTERN
00098   #elif defined(ICCPROFLIBDLL_IMPORTS)
00099     #define ICCPROFLIB_API _declspec(dllimport)
00100     #define ICCPROFLIB_EXTERN extern
00101   #else //just a regular lib
00102     #define ICCPROFLIB_API
00103     #define ICCPROFLIB_EXTERN
00104   #endif
00105 
00106   //Since msvc doesn't support cbrtf use pow instead
00107   #define ICC_CBRTF(v) pow((double)(v), 1.0/3.0)
00108 
00109   #if (_MSC_VER < 1300)
00110     #define ICC_UNSUPPORTED_TAG_DICT
00111   #endif
00112 
00113 #else // non-PC, perhaps Mac, Linux, or Solaris
00114 
00115   #define ICCUINT64 unsigned long long
00116   #define ICCINT64  long long
00117   #define ICUINT64TYPE unsigned long long
00118   #define ICINT64TYPE long long
00119 
00120   #include <stdint.h>
00121 
00122   //Make sure that 32 bit values are set correctly
00123   #define ICCUINT32 uint32_t
00124   #define ICCINT32  int32_t
00125   #define ICUINT32TYPE uint32_t
00126   #define ICINT32TYPE  int32_t
00127 
00128   #if defined(__APPLE__)
00129     #if  defined(__LITTLE_ENDIAN__)
00130       #define ICC_BYTE_ORDER_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00131     #else
00132       #define ICC_BYTE_ORDER_BIG_ENDIAN
00133     #endif
00134 
00135   #else // Sun Solaris or Linux
00136     #if defined(__sun__)
00137       #define ICC_BYTE_ORDER_BIG_ENDIAN
00138     #else
00139       #define ICC_BYTE_ORDER_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00140     #endif
00141   #endif
00142 
00143   #define ICCPROFLIB_API
00144   #define ICCPROFLIB_EXTERN
00145   #define stricmp strcasecmp
00146 
00147   //Define ICC_CBRTF as a call to cbrtf (replace with pow if system doesn't support cbrtf)
00148   #define ICC_CBRTF(v) cbrtf(v)
00149 
00150 #endif
00151 
00152 // remove comment below if you want LAB to XYZ conversions to not clip negative XYZ values
00153 //#define SAMPLEICC_NOCLIPLABTOXYZ
00154 
00155 #ifdef SAMPLEICCCMM_EXPORTS
00156 #define MAKE_A_DLL
00157 #endif
00158 
00159 #ifdef MAKE_A_DLL
00160 #define SAMPLEICCEXPORT __declspec( dllexport)
00161 #else
00162 #define SAMPLEICCEXPORT __declspec( dllimport)
00163 #endif
00164 
00165 #ifdef USESAMPLEICCNAMESPACE
00166 }
00167 #endif
00168 
00169 #endif //ICCCOFIG_h
